018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.report;
019
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Comparator;
022import java.util.List;
023
024/**
025 * Assembles report sections into a unified report.
026 *
027 * <p>Collects {@link ReportSection} instances, sorts them by order,
028 * and builds a formatted report string.</p>
029 *
030 * @author devteam@scivicslab.com
031 * @since 2.15.0
032 */
033public class ReportBuilder {
034
035    private final List<ReportSection> sections = new ArrayList<>();
036
037    /**
038     * Adds a section to the report.
039     *
040     * @param section the section to add
041     */
042    public void addSection(ReportSection section) {
043        if (section != null) {
044            sections.add(section);
045        }
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Builds the report string.
050     *
051     * <p>Sections are sorted by {@link ReportSection#getOrder()} and formatted as:</p>
052     * <pre>
053     * === Workflow Execution Report ===
054     *
055     * --- Section Title ---
056     * Section content
057     * </pre>
058     *
059     * <p>Sections with null or empty content are skipped.
060     * Sections with null or empty title output content directly without a title line.</p>
061     *
062     * @return the formatted report string
063     */
064    public String build() {
065        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
066
067        // Header
068        sb.append("=== Workflow Execution Report ===\n");
069
070        // Sort sections by order and output
071        sections.stream()
072            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(ReportSection::getOrder))
073            .forEach(section -> {
074                String content = section.getContent();
075                if (content != null && !content.isEmpty()) {
076                    String title = section.getTitle();
077                    if (title != null && !title.isEmpty()) {
078                        sb.append("\n--- ").append(title).append(" ---\n");
079                    }
080                    sb.append(content).append("\n");
081                }
082            });
083
084        return sb.toString();
085    }
086}
